official_title: A joint resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that following the achievement of a balanced budget, any existing budget surplus should be applied to reducing the national debt.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that, following the achievement of a balanced budget, any existing budget surplus should be applied to reducing the national debt. Declares that reducing the national debt should be a major goal of the United States fiscal policy in order to stimulate economic growth and cut inflation.
